Chinese.Description: 你的四肢变成八条蛛腿，你可以像蜘蛛一样移动，但你现在只能用嘴叼着一件东西。同时，你的食量增大，并倾向于食肉。蜘蛛将不再敌视你，但是，闪光果和烟雾果对你是致命的。

English.Description: Your limbs become eight spider legs, and you can move like a Big Spider, but now you can only hold a thing in your mouth. At the same time, your appetite increases and you tend to eat meat. Spiders and Big Spiders will no longer be hostile to you, but Flare Bomb and Spore Cloud are deadly to you.
